title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Legendary Whitetails Men’s Buck Camp Flannel – Long Sleeve Plaid Button-Down Casual Shirt with Corduroy Cuffs and Collar

Highlights
- Soft, 100% cotton flannel: Brushed for comfort with a substantial 5.1 oz weight that feels great from the first wear.
- Relaxed fit: Designed for ease through the chest and waist; double-pleated back provides natural movement without pulling or tugging.
- Built to last: Pill-resistant, fade-resistant fabric maintains a sharp look wash after wash.
- Signature details: Corduroy-lined collar and cuffs add durability and a classic, outdoors-inspired finish.
- Practical pocket: Classic single chest pocket with integrated pencil slot; great for pens, pencils, or sunglasses.
- Versatile plaid: Timeless pattern works indoors or out, ideal for layering over tees or wearing on its own.
- Everyday ready: No break-in required—immediate comfort right out of the box.
- Thoughtful construction: Button-down front, long sleeves, and cuff styling that stands up to repeated wear.

Fit and Fabric
- Fit: Relaxed Fit (refer to size chart for best results).
- Fabric: 100% Cotton, soft brushed flannel, 5.1 oz.
- Back style: Double-pleated for mobility.
- Collar/Cuffs: Corduroy lined for comfort and durability.
- Closure: Button down.
- Pattern: Plaid.
- Origin: Imported.

Care
- Follow provided care instructions for optimal shrinkage management and long-lasting color and feel.

Why You’ll Love It
This Buck Camp Flannel combines classic plaid style with rugged details that hold up to daily wear. The midweight, soft-brushed cotton is perfect for cool mornings, workshops, tailgates, and everything in between. Layer it over a tee when temperatures drop or wear it solo for a clean, casual look that’s comfortable all day.
